data.name: Home Loan-Package I.O.
data.description: Our Interest Only Ultimate Home Loan Package bundles your home loan, an everyday account & our low rate credit card. Includes establishment fee waivers on personal loans, no annual fee on a visa credit card and access to discounted general insurance.

features.additionalInfo: 100% Mortgage Offset account for owner occupied home loans.
Discounted variable or fixed interest rate owner-occupied loans. Available for interest only repayments to approved applicants
Payments can be arranged weekly, fortnightly or monthly.
10% discount on home and contents insurance through our insurance partner for the first year.
Maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80% without Lenders Mortgage Insurance (LMI).
Home Loan Establishment fee waived whilst an Ultimate Home Loan Package is held.
Personal Loan Establishment fee waived whilst an Ultimate Home Loan Package is held.

constraints.additionalInfo: Available where total borrowings from the Bank are $100,000 and over.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80% without Lenders Mortgage Insurance (LMI) or up to 95% where LMI is approved

eligibility.additionalValue: Loans are available to members of the bank who are permanent residents of Australia and currently live in Australia.

fees.name: Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Package Fee charged on commencement of Ultimate Home Loan Package and annually on anniversary of the commencement date.  If multiple loans are held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package member can nominate applicable loan to be charged.

eligibility.additionalInfo: When multiple loans are held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package, only 1 (one) package fee is charged to the members nominated loan.

fees.name: Other Credit Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Refer to our Fees and Charges brochure for information on other fees and charged which may apply.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: 1 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) Interest Only. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 0.50%p.a. discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

1 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (>80%) Interest Only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, the loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 0.50%p.a. discount of our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

2 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) Interest Only. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 0.50%p.a. discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

2 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (>80%) Interest Only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, the loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 0.50%p.a. discount of our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

3 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) Interest Only. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 0.50%p.a. discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

3 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (>80%) Interest Only. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, the loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 0.50%p.a. discount of our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special 1 Year Fixed Package Rate (<80%) - Interest Only. Available from 18 July 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Maximum LVR for owner occupied loans is 80%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.5%p.a. discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special 1 Year Fixed Package Rate (>80%) - Interest Only. Available from 18 July 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Maximum LVR for owner occupied loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.3%p.a. discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special 2 Year Fixed Package Rate (<80%) - Interest Only. Available from 18 July 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Maximum LVR for owner occupied loans is 80%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.55%p.a. discountoff our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special 2 Year Fixed Package Rate (>80%) - Interest Only. Available from 18 July 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Maximum LVR for owner occupied loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following expiry of the Interest Only fixed rate period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.35%p.a. discountoff our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special Variable Package Rate (>80%) - Interest Only. Available from 14 February 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Maximum LVR for owner occupied loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Owner Occupied Home loan Interest Only maximum term of 3 years. Includes a 2.90% p.a. discount off our Interest Only SVR. Following expiry of the interest only period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.55% p.a. discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan.

Special Variable Package Rate (<80%) - Interest Only. Available from 14 February 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Owner Occupied Home loan Interest Only maximum term of 3 years. Includes a 3.10% p.a. discount off our Interest Only SVR. Following expiry of the interest only period, loan will revert to principal and interest repayments with a 2.75% p.a. discount off our Principal and Interest SVR for the life of the loan. Maximum LVR for owner occupied loans is 80%.
Standard Ultimate Home Loan Package - Interest Only
